Competitiveness Compass (EC)

The European Commission releases its Competitiveness Compass, a blueprint for innovation, sustainability, and growth to be a global AI leader. The EU aims to close the innovation gap with the US and China by boosting start-ups, venture capital, and R&D, particularly in AI and deep-tech sectors.
